Text:
these fucking things just piss me off.  There weren't even 3050 games released even if you added Japanese + US Releases..  which means this is WAY over-bloated with shitty 'homebrew" games.. yeah.. afro-mario!  TOTALLY worth shitting through 3000 torrents!

Why cant someone just release a torrent with JUST PROPERLY NAMED USA RELEASES!?!?!?

NOBODY WANTS YOUR SHITTY HOMEBREW PORNO GAME!
